    • Method Detail

      • getMatrix

        float[] getMatrix(float[] array,
                  int offset)

        Copies the values of the final transformation matrix into the given array starting at the specified offset .

        Parameters:
        array - container.
        offset - starting index in given array.
        Returns:
        array.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if array is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if array's length is < 16 or there isn't enough space in the array with the given offset.
